body.name: ODK U Shaped Desk with Power Outlets & LED Strip & Monitor Stand, 66" Reversible L Shaped Desk with Drawers and Storage Shelf, Home Office Gaming Desk, White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 17 hrs 24 mins
features: 【U Shaped Gaming Desk】The U-shaped design desk keeps game and office items within easy reach. The sense of wrapping of U-shaped desk allows you to experience the immersive atmosphere of esports. The U shaped desk is a good choice for gaming or home office.

【Ample Storage Space】This home office desk designed with 1 monitor stand, 1 UPC stand, 2 open shelfs and 4-tier drawers, which can free up more desktop space. 2 shelfs for frequently used items makes office or game more convenient. 4-tier drawers can classify and store various items, and the desktop is no longer cluttered.

【U Desk with LED Lights】This desk is equipped with LED lighting with 7 colors, 20 lighting modes to create immersive gaming atomsphere. It features memory function which keeps the led lights staying on last mode when turned on. DIY your room and add immersive gaming vibes.

【Power Outlets and USB Charging Ports】The computer desk includes a built-in power strip with 3-outlets & 2 USB Ports which provides power support for your computer, tablet and phone. Keep your gaming equipments powered up at all times.

【Reversible & Adjustable】When installing the corner desk, you can choose whether to install the drawer on the left or right side according to your usage habits. The height-adjustable monitor stand provides an ergonomic sight level and better sitting posture to reduce neck and back pain.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews

reviews.reviewerName: The desk is awesome! Easy to assemble, clear instructions, extra hardware, exactly as shown. I would definitely buy this again!!!!!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like everything. Looks nice, sturdy, easy to assemble. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: The instructions recommend two people, but it is easily done by one person, just takes about 2 to 3 hours and that's taking your time. Everything is included, instructions are super simple and it aligns perfectly. Fits in a small area and holds two 24 inch monitors on the monitor strip. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality but Unclear Instructions
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my husband as a Christmas present. It’s sturdy and heavy— I watched the delivery driver thrown it onto his shoulder and carry it to my porch which initially misled me and made me worry it would be light and flimsy— not the case, he was clearly just much stronger than I am. The only problem my husband has run into with this desk is that the instruction manual was a little unclear in some places which led to a few mistakes during set-up. Either way, it’s all put together now and he’s a big fan!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Make sure you know what side you want you shelves and drawers on.
reviews.reviewText: I did not realize that there was a left side instructions and a right side. Luckily, it still worked out with the directions I read and completed. It seemed like it was going to be hard to put together and my husband was like, ummmm we will do this when we have time. Well, I am a crafter and I love putting puzzles together. Since we already had everything laid out in order.....I just decided.....why not. Husband was at work, I turned the tv on and just started one page at a time. I said, well.....I will leave the big parts for him.....lol it was done before he got home. So yes, it was easy and probably took about an hour or so. I didn't keep track of time....just did it without rushing to make sure it was done correctly. I am please with it. It looks great in my craftroom!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was amazed at how nice this was for the price, and how easy it went together. It perfectly suited my needs and would definitely recommend it to anyone who is looking for an affordable gaming desk. I did add a pull out keyboard tray and that helped as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Would give a one star if I could
reviews.reviewText: I had to initiate a return as this is what I found on multiple pieces are substandard and incomplete or cracking welds. The quality definitely left a lot to be desired. Unfortunately it will take a week to get a replacement so I had to get a refund it's currently sitting on my curb for the trash to take it. So now I'm without a desk until I can find a suitable replacement. Steer clear

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Had to ghetto rig it, but it looks good!
reviews.reviewText: Great looking desk, good function. Worst complaint is that it was hell putting it together. We tried to watch the video from the QR code but it would just take us to the Amazon page where it had no additional information. Ended up doing some improvising and got it hooked together. Tried following the directions that came with it but a video definitely would have helped. Overall 3/5 because building it was a pain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Honestly, for the price, amazing!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The desk is large and sturdy, with an excellent appearance and texture. It arrived in perfect condition, with no shipping damage. My initial reservations about the drawers (being that they’d be flimsy and break) were eased by their thick fabric and sturdy metal frames, which gave them the appearance of real wood. Each drawer's front is likewise quite sturdy. This desk is a good investment when considering the price, especially when bought on sale. The integrated lights are a nice touch. The desk's construction is incredibly stable; even when loaded heavily, it does not bow or wobble. The desk took less than an hour to put together by myself so I’d say almost anyone could put it together. You’d probably prefer to do it with two people though. It also came with easily accessible screws that took seconds to tighten (especially with an additional tool). In a nutshell it has the same solidity as a more expensive, all-wood desk. I'm so impressed that I'd gladly order another!! 10/10
